elements.title: lobster emoji (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a U.S. senator advocated for the lobster emoji (pictured)?

elements.title: Irina Voronina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Irina Voronina was once painted blue and orange for a nude photoshoot?

elements.title: O'Donoghue v. United States (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that, under O'Donoghue v. United States, Washington, D.C.'s courts are the only tribunals in the United States that might be both constitutional and legislative courts at the same time?

elements.title: Alek Skarlatos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alek Skarlatos, who helped foil a terrorist attack in 2015, became a member of the Oregon House of Representatives nearly a decade later?

elements.title: Berlin Papyrus Collection (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a cartel was formed to purchase papyri for the Berlin Papyrus Collection?

elements.title: Jane Madders (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that British physiotherapist Jane Madders developed relaxation training for pregnant women and migraine patients?

elements.title: a city in Genshin Impact (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the architecture of a city in Genshin Impact was influenced by an ancient town in the province of Hunan?

elements.title: July 1936 military uprising in Barcelona (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that dockworkers constructed makeshift barricades out of large rolls of paper during the July 1936 military uprising in Barcelona?

elements.title: /v/ (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that several Internet memes, including "is this Battletoads?" and the NPC Wojak, originated from the 4chan imageboard /v/?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
